units.title: Nuclei isolation
units.rationale: Describes the initial sample preparation step.

units.title: scATAC-seq execution
units.rationale: Specifies the core assay used to profile chromatin accessibility.

units.title: snRNA-seq on adult cortex
units.text: snRNA-seq was performed on sliced tissue cubes dissected from adult human, chimpanzee or bonobo, and macaque frozen prefrontal cortex tissue.
units.rationale: Details the single‑nucleus RNA sequencing procedure on adult brain samples.

units.title: t-SNE embedding using ChromVAR29
units.text: ChromVAR29-based t-stochastic neighbour embedding (t-SNE) of human (left, 518 cells) and chimpanzee (right, 908 cells) with cells coloured by time point or cell state.
units.rationale: Describes the dimensionality‑reduction and visualization step.

units.title: DA peak detection
units.text: Differentially accessible (DA) peaks detected humans overlapping differentially accessible peaks and non-differentially between human and chimpanzee NPCs and neurons.
units.rationale: Identifies the step where significant accessibility differences are called.

units.title: Peak enrichment analysis
units.text: Enrichment of accessible peaks (randomly sampled 2,000 times to match the number and selected biological-process gene ontology (GO) terms associated with average accessibility of differentially accessible peaks).
units.rationale: Explains the functional annotation of accessible peaks.
